channel.title: Jonin ascension Season 2
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Jonin ascension Season 2" - Season two, it says I have to have three bloodlines.

item.title: Re: Jonin ascension Season 2
item.content:encoded: He figured it out. You need 3 bloodlines. Red Eye and Reaper Blood count as 2. Most people get the Trade for the third. Mysterious Power should work though.

item.title: Re: Jonin ascension Season 2
item.content:encoded: are u sure it says that? couz u could be reading it the wrong way

item.title: Re: Jonin ascension Season 2
item.content:encoded: scratchy the whole question about points, I went back and reread the guide

item.title: Jonin ascension Season 2
item.content:encoded: I have red eye, and blood of the reaper shikai. Does true blood of the reaper count or do I have to get the trade or mysterious bloodline. Because I really don't feel like getting 200 bingo points or 50 referals. If that is the case, do I only get 1 bingo point for each bingo I do?
